entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump is so limited in both mental and physical capacity that he is can't make any progress on either of the two major disasters unfolding in the US; the COVID-19 explosion and the experience of black Americans. He's just sitting there, like a sick animal.
